New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers set a new franchise record with their 10th consecutive double-digit win
This is the second time in franchise history where the team has two separate 10-game winning streaks in a season (2008-09)
Key Match Events: A spirited duel between Darius Garland and LaMelo Ball set the tone for the game
Garland shadowed Ball for 94 feet and made key defensive plays
Both guards traded points and highlighted the game's competitive nature
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers were 31-4, a strong start to the season
The Hornets were on a nine-game losing streak, making it a potential trap game
Cavs' coach emphasized the team's maturity and focus despite a long road trip
Post-Match Reflections: Cavs' coach praised the team's maturity and focus
Garland expressed his goal to be an All-Star and his determination to perform well this season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the Cavs' first home victory of 2025
The matchup had an unspoken edge due to All-Star voting implications
Others: The game was a cohesive offensive effort with 29 assists from the Cavs
Charlotte relied heavily on isolation plays
